fields.headline: The Weekend Quiz
fields.bodyText: The questions 1 Which librarian died at Duchcov castle in 1798? 2 JC Dollman's painting A Very Gallant Gentleman depicts whom? 3 Who vowed, "I'll never be hungry again"? 4 Which is Germany's most populous state? 5 The Tech is the newspaper at which college? 6 The Chorleywood process is used to make what? 7 Grigory Chkhartishvili writes detective stories under what name? 8 The Brazilian wandering is the world's most venomous what? What links: 9 The Wedding Present; Soft Cell; the Sisters of Mercy; Kaiser Chiefs? 10 Ovid's Medea; Archimedes' On Sphere-Making; Aristotle's second book of Poetics? 11 Dubhe; Merak; Phecda; Megrez; Alioth; Mizar; Alkaid? 12 Speech and expression; worship; from want; from fear? 13 Irving Stone; Kirk Douglas; Iggy Pop? 14 Edward IV; Henry VII; George VI? 15 25 March; 24 June; 29 September; 25 December? The answers 1 Casanova. 2 Captain Oates. 3 Scarlett O'Hara in Gone With the Wind. 4 North Rhine-Westphalia (18 million people). 5 MIT. 6 Bread. 7 Boris Akunin. 8 Spider. 9 Groups from/formed in Leeds. 10 Lost classical texts. 11 Stars in the Plough. 12 Roosevelt's Four Freedoms in 1941 speech. 13 Lust for Life: wrote LfL book about Van Gogh; played VG in LfL film; song by. 14 Married Elizabeths: Woodville; of York; Bowes-Lyon. 15 English Quarter days: Lady Day; Midsummer; Michaelmas; Christmas.
